sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
*)=w lampro\n o)/mma tou= troxhla/tou lu/xnou
ka/llist' e)n eu)sto/xoisin e)zhthme/non:
gona/s te ga\r sa\s kai\ tu/xas dhlw/somen:
troxw=| ga\r e)laqei\s keramikh=s r(u/mhs u(/po
mukth=rsi lampra\s h(li/ou tima\s e)/xeis:
o(/rma flogo\s shmei=a ta\ cugkei/mena.
soi\ ga\r mo/nw| dhlou=men ei)ko/tws, e)pei\
ka)n toi=si dwmati/oisin *)afrodi/ths tro/pwn
peirwme/naisi plhsi/on parastatei=s,
lordoume/nwn te swma/twn e)pista/thn
o)fqalmo\n ou)dei\s to\n so\n e)cei/rgei do/mwn.
mo/nos de\ mhrw=n ei)s a)porrh/tous muxou\s
la/mpeis a)feu/wn th\n e)panqou=san tri/xa:
stoa/s te karpou= *bakxi/ou te na/matos
plh/reis u(poignu/saisi sumparastatei=s:
kai\ tau=ta sundrw=n ou) lalei=s toi=s plhsi/on.
a)nq' w(=n sunei/sei kai\ ta\ nu=n bouleu/mata
o(/sa *ski/rois e)/doce tai=s e)mai=s fi/lais.
a)ll' ou)demi/a pa/restin a(\s h(/kein e)xrh=n.
kai/toi pro\s o)/rqron g' e)sti/n: h( d' e)kklhsi/a
au)ti/ka ma/l' e)/stai: katalabei=n d' h(ma=s e(/dras,
a(\s *furo/maxo/s pot' ei)=pen, ei) me/mnhsq' e)/ti,
dei= ta\s e(te/ras pws ka)gkaqezome/nas laqei=n.
ti/ dh=t' a)\n ei)/h; po/teron ou)k e)rramme/nous
e)/xousi tou\s pw/gwnas, ou(\s ei)/rht' e)/xein;
h)\ qai)ma/tia ta)ndrei=a kleya/sais laqei=n
h)=n xalepo\n au)tai=s; a)ll' o(rw= tondi\ lu/xnon
prosio/nta. fe/re nun e)panaxwrh/sw pa/lin,
mh\ kai/ tis w)\n a)nh\r o( prosiw\n tugxa/nh|.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
w(/ra badi/zein, w(s o( kh=ruc a)rti/ws
h(mw=n prosiousw=n deu/teron keko/kkuken.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
e)gw\ de/ g' u(ma=s prosdokw=s' h)grhgo/rh
th
 nu/kta pa=san. a)lla\ fe/re th
 gei/tona
th/nd' e)kkale/swmai qrugonw=sa th
 qu/ran.
dei= ga to
 a)/ndr' au)th=s laqei=n.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p:
h)/kousa/ toi
u(podoume/nh to\ knu=ma/ sou tw=n daktu/lwn,
a(/t' ou) katadarqou=s'. o( ga\r a)nh\r w)= filta/th,
*salami/nios ga/r e)stin w(=| cu/neim' e)gw/,
th\n nu/xq' o(/lhn h)/laune/ m' e)n toi=s strw/masin,
w(/st' a)/rti touti\ qoi)ma/tion au)tou= 'labon.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
kai\ mh\n o(rw= kai\ *kleinare/thn kai\ *swstra/thn
prosiou=san h)/dh th/nde kai\ *filaine/thn.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
ou)/koun e)pei/cesq'; w(s *glu/kh katw/mosen
th\n u(sta/thn h(/kousan oi)/nou trei=s xoa=s
h(mw=n a)potei/sein ka)rebi/nqwn xoi/nika.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
th\n *smikuqi/wnos d' ou)x o(ra=|s *melisti/xhn
speu/dousan e)n tai=s e)mba/sin;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
kai/toi dokei=
kata\ sxolh\n para\ ta)ndro\s e)celqei=n mo/nh.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
th\n tou= kaph/lou d' ou)x o(ra=|s *geusistra/thn
e)/xousan e)n th=| decia=| th\n lampa/da;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p:
kai\ th\n *filodwrh/tou te kai\ *xairhta/dou
o(rw= prosiou/sas xa)te/ras polla\s pa/nu
gunai=kas, o(/ ti pe/r e)st' o)/felos e)n th=| po/lei.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *g
sp.p:
kai\ pa/nu talaipw/rws e)/gwg' w)= filta/th
e)kdra=sa pare/dun. o( ga\r a)nh\r th\n nu/xq' o(/lhn
e)/bhtte trixi/dwn e(spe/ras e)mplh/menos.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
ka/qhsqe toi/nun, w(s a)\n a)ne/rwmai ta/de
u(ma=s, e)peidh\ sullelegme/nas o(rw=,
o(/sa *ski/rois e)/docen ei) dedra/kate.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
e)/gwge. prw=ton me/n g' e)/xw ta\s masxa/las
lo/xmhs dasute/ras, kaqa/per h)=n cugkei/menon:
e)/peiq' o(po/q' a(nh\r ei)s a)gora\n oi)/xoito/ mou,
a)leiyame/nh to\ sw=m' o(/lon di' h(me/ras
e)xraino/mhn e(stw=sa pro\s to\n h(/lion.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p:
ka)/gwge: to\ curo\n de/ g' e)k th=s oi)ki/as
e)/rriya prw=ton, i(/na dasunqei/hn o(/lh
kai\ mhde\n ei)/hn e)/ti gunaiki\ prosferh/s.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
e)/xete de\ tou\s pw/gwnas, ou(\s ei)/rht' e)/xein
pa/saisin h(mi=n, o(po/te sullegoi/meqa;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: nh\ th\n *(eka/thn kalo/n g' e)/gwge toutoni/.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p: ka)/gwg' *(epikra/tous ou)k o)li/gw| kalli/ona.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: u(mei=s de\ ti/ fate;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: fasi/: kataneu/ousi ga/r.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
kai\ mh\n ta/ g' a)/ll' u(mi=n o(rw= pepragme/na.
*lakwnika\s ga\r e)/xete kai\ bakthri/as
kai\ qai)ma/tia ta)ndrei=a, kaqa/per ei)/pomen.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
e)/gwge/ toi to\ sku/talon e)chnegka/mhn
to\ tou= *lami/ou touti\ kaqeu/dontos la/qra|.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p: tou=t' e)/st' e)kei/nwn tw=n skuta/lwn w(=n pe/rdetai.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
nh\ to
 *di/a to
 swth=r' e)pith/deio/s g' a)
 h)=n
th
 tou= pano/ptou difqe/ran e)nhmme/nos
ei)/per tis a)/llos boukolei=n to\ dh/mion.
a)ll' a)/geq' o(/pws kai\ ta)pi\ tou/tois dra/somen,
e(/ws e)/t' e)sti
 a)/stra kata\ to
 ou)rano/n:
h(kklhsi/a d', ei)s h(
 pareskeua/smeqa
h(mei=s badi/zein, e)c e(/w genh/setai.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *di/' w(/ste dei= se katalabei=n e(/dras
u(po\ tw=| li/qw| tw=n pruta/newn katantikru/.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p:
tauti/ ge/ toi nh\ to\n *di/' e)fero/mhn, i(/na
plhroume/nhs cai/noimi th=s e)kklhsi/as.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: plhroume/nhs ta/laina;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p:
nh\ th\n *)/artemin
e)/gwge. ti/ ga\r a)\n xei=ron a)krow/|mhn a)/ra
cai/nousa; gumna\ d' e)sti/ mou ta\ paidi/a.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
i)dou/ ge/ se cai/nousan, h(
 tou= sw/matos
ou)de
 parafh=nai toi=s kaqhme/nois e)/dei.
ou)kou=n kala/ g' a)
 pa/qoimen, ei) plh/rhs tu/xoi
o( dh=mos w)
 ka)/peiq' u(perbai/nousa/ tis
a)naballome/nh dei/ceie to
 *formi/sion.
h)
 d' e)gkaqezw/mesqa pro/terai, lh/somen
custeila/menai qai)ma/tia: to
 pw/gwna/ te
o(/tan kaqw=men o(
 peridhso/mesq' e)kei=,
ti/s ou)k a)
 h(ma=s a)/ndras h(gh/saiq' o(rw=n;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
*)agu/rrios gou=n to\n *prono/mou pw/gwn' e)/xwn
le/lhqe: kai/toi pro/teron h)=n ou(=tos gunh/:
nuni\ d', o(ra=|s, pra/ttei ta\ me/gist' e)n th=| po/lei.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
tou/tou ge toi/nun th\n e)piou=san h(me/ran
to/lmhma tolmw=men tosou=ton ou(/neka,
h)/n pws paralabei=n th=s po/lews ta\ pra/gmata
dunw/meq', w(/st' a)gaqo/n ti pra=cai th\n po/lin:
nu=n me\n ga\r ou)/te qe/omen ou)/t' e)lau/nomen.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
kai\ pw=s gunaikw=n qhlu/frwn cunousi/a
dhmhgorh/sei;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
polu\ me\n ou)=n a)/rista/ pou.
le/gousi ga\r kai\ tw=n neani/skwn o(/soi
plei=sta spodou=ntai, deinota/tous ei)=nai le/gein:
h(mi=n d' u(pa/rxei tou=to kata\ tu/xhn tina/.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: ou)k oi)=da: deino\n d' e)sti\n h( mh\ 'mpeiri/a.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
ou)kou=n e)pi/thdes cunele/ghmen e)nqa/de,
o(/pws promeleth/swmen a(kei= dei= le/gein.
ou)k a)\n fqa/nois to\ ge/neion a)\n peridoume/nh
a)/llai q' o(/sai lalei=n memeleth/kasi/ pou.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: ti/s d' w)= me/l' h(mw=n ou) lalei=n e)pi/statai;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
i)/qi dh\ su\ peridou= kai\ taxe/ws a)nh\r genou=:
e)gw\ de\ qei=sa tou\s stefa/nous peridh/somai
kau)th\ meq' u(mw=n, h)/n ti/ moi do/ch| le/gein.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
deu=r' w)= glukuta/th *pracago/ra, ske/yai ta/lan
w(s kai\ katage/laston to\ pra=gma fai/netai.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: pw=s katage/laston;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
w(/sper ei)/ tis shpi/ais
pw/gwna peridh/seien e)staqeume/nais.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
*gunh\ *a
sp.p: e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: peri/qou dh\ to\n ste/fanon tu/xa)gaqh=|.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: i)dou/.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: le/gois a)/n.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: ei)=ta pri\n piei=n le/gw;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: i)dou\ piei=n.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: ti/ ga\r w)= me/l' e)stefanwsa/mhn;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
a)/piq' e)kpodw/n: toiau=t' a)\n h(ma=s h)rga/sw
ka)kei=.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: ti/ d'; ou) pi/nousi ka)n th)kklhsi/a|;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: i)dou/ ge soi\ pi/nousi.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
nh\ th\n *)/artemin
kai\ tau=ta g' eu)/zwron. ta\ gou=n bouleu/mata
au)tw=n o(/s' a)\n pra/cwsin e)nqumoume/nois
w(/sper mequo/ntwn e)sti\ parapeplhgme/na.
kai\ nh\ *di/a spe/ndousi/ g': h)\ ti/nos xa/rin
tosau=t' a)\n hu)/xont', ei)/per oi)=nos mh\ parh=n;
kai\ loidorou=ntai/ g' w(/sper e)mpepwko/tes,
kai\ to\n paroinou=nt' e)kfe/rous' oi( toco/tai,

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: su\ me\n ba/dize kai\ ka/qhs': ou)de\n ga\r ei)=.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *di/' h)= moi mh\ geneia=n krei=tton h)=n:
di/yh| ga/r, w(s e)/oik', a)fauanqh/somai.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: e)/sq' h(/tis e(te/ra bou/letai le/gein;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p: e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
i)/qi dh\ stefanou=: kai\ ga\r to\ xrh=m' e)rga/zetai.
a)/ge nun o(/pws a)ndristi\ kai\ kalw=s e)rei=s
diereisame/nh to\ sxh=ma th=| bakthri/a|.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p:
e)boulo/mhn me
 a)
 e(/teron tw=n h)qa/dwn
le/gein ta\ be/ltisq', i(/n' e)kaqh/mhn h(/suxos:
nu=n d' ou)k e)a/sw kata/ ge th
 e)mh
 mi/an
e)n toi=s kaphlei/oisi la/kkous e)mpoiei=n
u(/datos. e)moi\ me
 ou) dokei= ma\ tw\ qew/.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: ma\ tw\ qew/; ta/laina pou= to\n nou=n e)/xeis;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p: ti/ d' e)/stin; ou) ga\r dh\ piei=n g' h)/|thsa/ se.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
ma\ *di/' a)ll' a)nh\r w)\n tw\ qew\ katw/mosas,
kai/toi ta/ g' a)/ll' ei)pou=sa deciw/tata.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p: w)\ nh\ to\n *)apo/llw.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
pau=e toi/nun, w(s e)gw\
e)kklhsia/sous' ou)k a)
 probai/hn to
 po/da
to
 e(/teron, ei) mh\ tau=t' a)kribwqh/setai.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p:
fe/re to\n ste/fanon: e)gw\ ga\r au)= le/cw pa/lin.
oi)=mai ga\r h)/dh memelethke/nai kalw=s.
e)moi\ ga\r w)= gunai=kes ai( kaqh/menai—

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: gunai=kas au)= du/sthne tou\s a)/ndras le/geis;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p:
di' *)epi/gono/n g' e)kei=non: e)pible/yasa ga\r
e)kei=se pro\s gunai=kas w)|o/mhn le/gein.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
a)/perre kai\ su\ kai\ ka/qhs' e)nteuqeni/:
au)th\ ga\r u(mw=n g' e(/neka/ moi le/cein dokw=
tondi\ labou=sa. toi=s qeoi=s me\n eu)/xomai
tuxei=n katorqw/sasa ta\ bebouleume/na.
e)moi\ d' i)/son me\n th=sde th=s xw/ras me/ta
o(/sonper u(mi=n: a)/xqomai de\ kai\ fe/rw
ta\ th=s po/lews a(/panta bare/ws pra/gmata.
o(rw= ga\r au)th\n prosta/taisi xrwme/nhn
a)ei\ ponhroi=s: ka)/n tis h(me/ran mi/an
xrhsto\s ge/nhtai, de/ka ponhro\s gi/gnetai.
e)pe/treyas e(te/rw|: plei/on' e)/ti dra/sei kaka/.
xalepo\n me\n ou)=n a)/ndras dusare/stous nouqetei=n,
oi(\ tou\s filei=n me\n boulome/nous dedoi/kate,
tou\s d' ou)k e)qe/lontas a)ntibolei=q' e(ka/stote.
e)kklhsi/aisin h)=n o(/t' ou)k e)xrw/meqa
ou)de\n to\ para/pan: a)lla\ to/n g' *)agu/rrion
ponhro\n h(gou/mesqa: nu=n de\ xrwme/nwn
o( me\n labw\n a)rgu/rion u(pereph/|nesen,
o( d' ou) labw\n ei)=nai qana/tou fh/s' a)ci/ous
tou\s misqoforei=n zhtou=ntas e)n th)kklhsi/a|.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: nh\ th\n *)afrodi/thn eu)= ge tautagi\ le/geis.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
ta/lain' *)afrodi/thn w)/mosas; xari/enta/ g' a)\n
e)/drasas, ei) tou=t' ei)=pas e)n th)kklhsi/a|.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: a)ll' ou)k a)\n ei)=pon.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
mhd' e)qi/zou nu=n le/gein.
to\ summaxiko\n au)= tou=q', o(/t' e)skopou/meqa,
ei) mh\ ge/noit', a)polei=n e)/faskon th\n po/lin:
o(/te dh\ d' e)ge/net', h)/xqonto, tw=n de\ r(hto/rwn
o( tou=t' a)napei/sas eu)qu\s a)podra\s w)/|xeto.
nau=s dei= kaqe/lkein: tw=| pe/nhti me\n dokei=,
toi=s plousi/ois de\ kai\ gewrgoi=s ou) dokei=.
*korinqi/ois a)/xqesqe, ka)kei=noi/ ge/ soi:
nu=n ei)si\ xrhstoi/, kai\ su/ nun xrhsto\s genou=.
*)argei=os a)maqh/s, a)ll' *(ierw/numos sofo/s:
swthri/a pare/kuyen, a)ll' w(ra/|zetai
*qrasu/boulos au)to\s ou)xi\ parakalou/menos.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: w(s cuneto\s a(nh/r.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
nu=n kalw=s e)ph/|nesas.
u(mei=s ga/r e)st' w)= dh=me tou/twn ai)/tioi.
ta\ dhmo/sia ga\r misqoforou=ntes xrh/mata
i)di/a| skopei=sq' e(/kastos o(/ ti tis kerdanei=,
to\ de\ koino\n w(/sper *ai)/simos kuli/ndetai.
h)\n ou)=n e)moi\ pi/qhsqe, swqh/sesq' e)/ti.
tai=s ga\r gunaici\ fhmi\ xrh=nai th\n po/lin
h(ma=s paradou=nai. kai\ ga\r e)n tai=s oi)ki/ais
tau/tais e)pitro/pois kai\ tami/aisi xrw/meqa.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: eu)= g' eu)= ge nh\ *di/' eu)= ge.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p: le/ge le/g' w)=gaqe/.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
w(s d' ei)si\n h(mw=n tou\s tro/pous belti/ones
e)gw\ dida/cw. prw=ta me\n ga\r ta)/ria
ba/ptousi qermw=| kata\ to\n a)rxai=on no/mon
a(paca/pasai, kou)xi\ metapeirwme/nas
i)/dois a)\n au)ta/s. h( d' *)aqhnai/wn po/lis,
ei) tou=to xrhstw=s ei)=xen, ou)k a)\n e)sw/|zeto,
ei) mh/ ti kaino\n a)/llo perihrga/zeto.
kaqh/menai fru/gousin w(/sper kai\ pro\ tou=:
e)pi\ th=s kefalh=s fe/rousin w(/sper kai\ pro\ tou=:
ta\ *qesmofo/ri' a)/gousin w(/sper kai\ pro\ tou=:
pe/ttousi tou\s plakou=ntas w(/sper kai\ pro\ tou=:
tou\s a)/ndras e)pitri/bousin w(/sper kai\ pro\ tou=:
moixou\s e)/xousin e)/ndon w(/sper kai\ pro\ tou=:
au(tai=s paroywnou=sin w(/sper kai\ pro\ tou=:
oi)=non filou=s' eu)/zwron w(/sper kai\ pro\ tou=:
binou/menai xai/rousin w(/sper kai\ pro\ tou=.
tau/taisin ou)=n w)=ndres parado/ntes th\n po/lin
mh\ perilalw=men, mhde\ punqanw/meqa
ti/ pot' a)/ra dra=n me/llousin, a)ll' a(plw=| tro/pw|
e)w=men a)/rxein, skeya/menoi tauti\ mo/na,
w(s tou\s stratiw/tas prw=ton ou)=sai mhte/res
sw/|zein e)piqumh/sousin: ei)=ta siti/a
ti/s th=s tekou/shs ma=llon e)pipe/myeien a)/n;
xrh/mata pori/zein eu)porw/taton gunh/,
a)/rxousa/ t' ou)k a)\n e)capathqei/h pote/:
au)tai\ ga/r ei)sin e)capata=n ei)qisme/nai.
ta\ d' a)/ll' e)a/sw: tau=t' e)a\n pi/qhsqe/ moi,
eu)daimonou=ntes to\n bi/on dia/cete.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
eu)= g' w)= glukuta/th *pracago/ra kai\ deciw=s.
po/qen w)= ta/laina tau=t' e)/maqes ou(/tw kalw=s;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
e)n tai=s fugai=s meta\ ta)ndro\s w)/|khs' e)n pukni/:
e)/peit' a)kou/ous' e)ce/maqon tw=n r(hto/rwn.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
ou)k e)to\s a)/r' w)= me/l' h)=sqa deinh\ kai\ sofh/:
kai/ se strathgei=n ai( gunai=kes au)to/qen
ai(rou/meq', h)\n tau=q' a(pinoei=s katerga/sh|.
a)ta\r h)\n *ke/falo/s soi loidorh=tai prosfqarei/s,
pw=s a)nterei=s pro\s au)to\n e)n th)kklhsi/a|;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: fh/sw parafronei=n au)to/n.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
a)lla\ tou=to/ ge
i)/sasi pa/ntes.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: a)lla\ kai\ melagxola=n.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: kai\ tou=t' i)/sasin.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
a)lla\ kai\ ta\ tru/blia
kakw=s kerameu/ein, th\n de\ po/lin eu)= kai\ kalw=s.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: ti/ d' h)\n *neoklei/dhs o( gla/mwn se loidorh=|;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p: tou/tw| me\n ei)=pon e)s kuno\s pugh\n o(ra=n.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p: ti/ d' h)\n u(pokrou/wsi/n se;

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
proskinh/somai
a(/t' ou)k a)/peiros ou)=sa pollw=n krouma/twn.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
e)kei=no mo/non a)/skepton, h)/n s' oi( toco/tai
e(/lkwsin, o(/ ti dra/seis pot'.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
e)cagkwniw=
w(di/: me/sh ga\r ou)de/pote lhfqh/somai.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p: h(mei=s de/ g', h)\n ai)/rws', e)a=n keleu/somen.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.p:
tauti\ me\n h(mi=n e)ntequ/mhtai kalw=s
e)kei=no d' ou) pefronti/kamen, o(/tw| tro/pw|
ta\s xei=ras ai)/rein mnhmoneu/somen to/te.
ei)qisme/nai ga/r e)smen ai)/rein tw\ ske/lei.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
xalepo\n to\ pra=gm': o(/mws de\ xeirotonhte/on
e)cwmisa/sais to\n e(/teron braxi/ona.
a)/ge nun a)naste/llesq' a)/nw ta\ xitw/nia:
u(podei=sqe d' w(s ta/xista ta\s *lakwnika/s,
w(/sper to\n a)/ndr' e)qea=sq', o(/t' ei)s e)kklhsi/an
me/lloi badi/zein h)\ qu/raz' e(ka/stote.
e)/peit' e)peida\n tau=ta pa/nt' e)/xh| kalw=s,
peridei=sqe tou\s pw/gwnas. h(ni/k' a)\n de/ ge
tou/tous a)kribw/shte perihrmosme/nai,
kai\ qai)ma/tia ta)ndrei=a/ g' a(/per e)kle/yate
e)panaba/lesqe, ka)=|ta tai=s bakthri/ais
e)pereido/menai badi/zet' a)/|dousai me/los
presbutiko/n ti, to\n tro/pon mimou/menai
to\n tw=n a)groi/kwn.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *b
sp.p:
eu)= le/geis: h(mei=s de/ ge
proi/+wmen au)tw=n. kai\ ga\r e(te/ras oi)/omai
e)k tw=n a)grw=n e)s th\n pu/kn' h(/cein a)/ntikrus
gunai=kas.

sp.speaker: *praca/gora
sp.p:
a)lla\ speu/saq' w(s ei)/wq' e)kei=
toi=s mh\ parou=sin o)rqri/ois e)s th\n pu/kna
u(papotre/xein e)/xousi mhde\ pa/ttalon.

sp.speaker: *xoro\s
sp.p:
w(/ra probai/nein w)=ndres h(mi=n e)sti: tou=to ga\r xrh\
memnhme/nas a)ei\ le/gein, w(s mh/pot' e)coli/sqh|
h(ma=s. o( ki/ndunos ga\r ou)xi\ mikro/s, h)\n a(lw=men
e)nduo/menai kata\ sko/ton to/lmhma thlikou=ton.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
xwrw=men ei)s e)kklhsi/an w)=ndres: h)pei/lhse ga\r
o( qesmoqe/ths, o(\s a)\n
mh\ prw\| pa/nu tou= kne/fous
h(/kh| kekonime/nos,
ste/rgwn skoroda/lmh|
ble/pwn u(po/trimma, mh\
dw/sein to\ triw/bolon.
a)ll' w)= *xaritimi/dh
kai\ *smi/kuqe kai\ *dra/khs
e(/pou katepei/gwn,
sautw=| prose/xwn o(/pws
mhde\n paraxordiei=s
w(=n dei= s' a)podei=cai:
o(/pws de\ to\ su/mbolon
labo/ntes e)/peita plhsi/oi
kaqedou/meq', w(s
a)\n xeirotonw=men
a(/panq' o(po/s' a)\n de/h|
ta\s h(mete/ras fi/las.
kai/toi ti/ le/gw; fi/lous
ga\r xrh=n m' o)noma/zein.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
o(/ra d' o(/pws w)qh/somen tou/sde tou\s e)c a)/stews
h(/kontas, o(/soi pro\ tou=
me/n, h(ni/k' e)/dei labei=n
e)lqo/nt' o)bolo\n mo/non,
kaqh=nto lalou=ntes
e)n toi=s stefanw/masin,
nuni\ d' e)noxlou=s' a)/gan.
a)ll' ou)xi/, *murwni/dhs
o(/t' h)=rxen o( genna/das,
ou)dei\s a)\n e)to/lma
ta\ th=s po/lews dioikei=n
a)rgu/rion fe/rwn:
a)ll' h(=ken e(/kastos
e)n a)skidi/w| fe/rwn
piei=n a(/ma t' a)/rton au(tw=|
kai\ du/o krommu/w
kai\ trei=s a)\n e)la/as.
nuni\ de\ triw/bolon
zhtou=si labei=n, o(/tan
pra/ttwsi/ ti koino\n w(/s-
per phloforou=ntes.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
ti/ to\ pra=gma; poi= poq' h( gunh\ frou/dh 'sti/ moi;
e)pei\ pro\s e(/w nu=n g' e)/stin, h( d' ou) fai/netai.
e)gw\ de\ kata/keimai pa/lai xezhtiw=n,
ta\s e)mba/das zhtw=n labei=n e)n tw=| sko/tw|
kai\ qoi)ma/tion: o(/te dh\ d' e)kei=no yhlafw=n
ou)k e)duna/mhn eu(rei=n, o( d' h)/dh th\n qu/ran
e)pei=xe krou/wn o( kopreai=os, lamba/nw
touti\ to\ th=s gunaiko\s h(midiploi/dion,
kai\ ta\s e)kei/nhs *persika\s u(fe/lkomai.
a)ll' e)n kaqarw=| pou=, pou= tis a)\n xe/sas tu/xoi;
h)\ pantaxou= toi nukto/s e)stin e)n kalw=|;
ou) ga/r me nu=n xe/zonta/ g' ou)dei\s o)/yetai.
oi)/moi kakodai/mwn, o(/ti ge/rwn w)\n h)go/mhn
gunai=x': o(/sas ei)/m' a)/cios plhga\s labei=n.
ou) ga/r poq' u(gie\s ou)de\n e)celh/luqen
dra/sous'. o(/mws d' ou)=n e)stin a)popathte/on.

sp.speaker: *)anh/r
sp.p: ti/s e)/stin; ou) dh/pou *ble/puros o( geitniw=n;

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: nh\ to\n *di/' au)to\s dh=t' e)kei=nos.

sp.speaker: *)anh/r
*ble/puros
sp.p:
ou)/k, a)lla\ th=s gunaiko\s e)celh/luqa
to\ krokwti/dion a)mpisxo/menos ou(ndu/etai.

sp.speaker: *)anh/r
sp.p: to\ d' i(ma/tio/n sou pou= 'stin;

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
ou)k e)/xw fra/sai.
zhtw=n ga\r au)/t' ou)x hu(=ron e)n toi=s strw/masin.

sp.speaker: *)anh/r
sp.p: ei)=t' ou)de\ th\n gunai=k' e)ke/leusa/s soi fra/sai;

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
ma\ to\n *di/' ou) ga\r e)/ndon ou)=sa tugxa/nei,
a)ll' e)ktetru/phken laqou=sa/ m' e)/ndoqen:
o(\ kai\ de/doika mh/ ti dra=| new/teron.

sp.speaker: *)anh/r
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *poseidw= tau)ta\ toi/nun a)/ntikrus
e)moi\ pe/ponqas. kai\ ga\r h(=| cu/neim' e)gw\
frou/dh 'st' e)/xousa qoi)ma/tion ou(gw\ 'fo/roun.
kou) tou=to lupei= m', a)lla\ kai\ ta\s e)mba/das.
ou)/koun labei=n g' au)ta\s e)duna/mhn ou)damou=.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
ma\ to\n *dio/nuson ou)d' e)gw\ ga\r ta\s e)ma\s
*lakwnika/s, a)ll' w(s e)/tuxon xezhtiw=n,
e)s tw\ koqo/rnw tw\ po/d' e)nqei\s i(/emai,
i(/na mh\ 'gxe/saim' e)s th\n sisu/ran: fanh\ ga\r h)=n.

sp.speaker: *)anh/r
sp.p:
ti/ dh=t' a)\n ei)/h; mw=n e)p' a)/riston gunh\
ke/klhken au)th\n tw=n fi/lwn;

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: gnw/mhn g' e)mh/n.

sp.speaker: *)anh/r
sp.p:
ou)/koun ponhra/ g' e)sti\n o(/ ti ka)/m' ei)de/nai.
a)lla\ su\ me\n i(monia/n tin' a)popatei=s, e)moi\ d'
w(/ra badi/zein e)sti\n ei)s e)kklhsi/an,
h)/nper la/bw qoi)ma/tion, o(/per h)=n moi mo/non.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
ka)/gwg', e)peida\n a)popath/sw: nu=n de/ mou
a)xra/s tis e)gklh/|sas' e)/xei ta\ siti/a.

sp.speaker: *)anh/r
sp.p: mw=n h(\n *qrasu/boulos ei)=pe toi=s *lakwnikoi=s;

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *dio/nuson e)ne/xetai gou=n moi sfo/dra.
a)ta\r ti/ dra/sw; kai\ ga\r ou)de\ tou=to/ me
mo/non to\ lupou=n e)stin, a)ll' o(/tan fa/gw,
o(/poi badiei=tai/ moi to\ loipo\n h( ko/pros.
nu=n me\n ga\r ou(=tos bebala/nwke th\n qu/ran,
o(/stis pot' e)/sq' a(/nqrwpos a(xradou/sios.
ti/s a)\n ou)=n i)atro/n moi mete/lqoi kai\ ti/na;
ti/s tw=n kata\ prwkto\n deino/s e)sti th\n te/xnhn;
a)ll' oi)=d', *)amu/nwn. a)ll' i)/sws a)rnh/setai.
*)antisqe/nh tis kalesa/tw pa/sh| te/xnh|.
ou(=tos ga\r a(nh\r e(/neka/ ge stenagma/twn
oi)=den ti/ prwkto\s bou/letai xezhtiw=n.
w)= po/tni' *ei)lei/quia mh/ me perii/dh|s
diarrage/nta mhde\ bebalanwme/non,
i(/na mh\ ge/nwmai skwrami\s kwmw|dikh/.

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p: ou(=tos ti/ poiei=s; ou)/ti pou xe/zeis;

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
e)gw/;
ou) dh=t' e)/ti ge ma\ to\n *di/', a)ll' a)ni/stamai.

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p: to\ th=s gunaiko\s d' a)mpe/xei xitw/nion;

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
e)n tw=| sko/tw| ga\r tou=t' e)/tuxon e)/ndon labw/n.
a)ta\r po/qen h(/keis e)teo/n;

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs

nh\ *di/' o)/rqrion me
 ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: to\ triw/bolon dh=t' e)/labes;

sp.p:
ei) ga\r w)/felon.
a)ll' u(/steros nu=n h)=lqon, w(/st' ai)sxu/nomai
ma\ to\n *di/' ou)de/n' a)/llon h)\ to\n qu/lakon.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: to\ d' ai)/tion ti/;

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
plei=stos a)nqrw/pwn o)/xlos,
o(/sos ou)depw/pot' h)=lq' a(qro/os e)s th\n pu/kna.
kai\ dh=ta pa/ntes skutoto/mois h)|ka/zomen
o(rw=ntes au)tou/s. ou) ga\r a)ll' u(perfuw=s
w(s leukoplhqh\s h)=n i)dei=n h(kklhsi/a:
w(/st' ou)k e)/labon ou)/t' au)to\s ou)/t' a)/lloi suxnoi/.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: ou)d' a)/r' a)\n e)gw\ la/boimi nu=n e)lqw/n;

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
*ble/puros
sp.p:
oi)/moi dei/laios.
*)anti/lox' a)poi/mwco/n me tou= triwbo/lou
to\n zw=nta ma=llon. ta)ma\ ga\r dioi/xetai.
a)ta\r ti/ to\ pra=gm' h)=n, o(/ti tosou=ton xrh=m' o)/xlou
ou(/tws e)n w(/ra| cunele/gh;

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
ti/ d' a)/llo g' h)\
e)/doce toi=s pruta/nesi peri\ swthri/as
gnw/mas kaqei=nai th=s po/lews; ka)=|t' eu)qe/ws
prw=tos *neoklei/dhs o( gla/mwn parei/rpusen.
ka)/peiq' o( dh=mos a)naboa=| po/son dokei=s,
ou) deina\ tolma=n toutoni\ dhmhgorei=n,
kai\ tau=ta peri\ swthri/as prokeime/nou,
o(\s au)to\s au(tw=| blefari/d' ou)k e)sw/sato;
o( d' a)naboh/sas kai\ perible/yas e)/fh,
ti/ dai/ me xrh=n dra=n;

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
sko/rod' o(mou= tri/yant' o)pw=|
tiqu/mallon e)mbalo/nta tou= *lakwnikou=
sautou= paralei/fein ta\ ble/fara th=s e(spe/ras,
e)/gwg' a)\n ei)=pon, ei) parw\n e)tu/gxanon.

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
meta\ tou=ton *eu)ai/wn o( deciw/tatos
parh=lqe gumno/s, w(s e)do/kei toi=s plei/osin:
au)to/s ge me/ntou)/fasken i(ma/tion e)/xein:
ka)/peit' e)/lece dhmotikwta/tous lo/gous:
o(ra=te me/n me deo/menon swthri/as
tetrastath/rou kau)to/n: a)ll' o(/mws e)rw=
w(s th\n po/lin kai\ tou\s poli/tas sw/sete.
h)\n ga\r pare/xwsi toi=s deome/nois oi( knafh=s
xlai/nas, e)peida\n prw=ton h(/lios traph=|,
pleuri=tis h(mw=n ou)de/n' a)\n la/boi pote/.
o(/sois de\ kli/nh mh/ 'sti mhde\ strw/mata,
i)e/nai kaqeudh/sontas a)ponenimme/nous
e)s tw=n skulodeyw=n: h)\n d' a)poklh/|h| qu/ra|
xeimw=nos o)/ntos, trei=s sisu/ras o)feile/tw.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *dio/nuson xrhsta/ g': ei) d' e)kei=na/ ge
prose/qhken, ou)dei\s a)ntexeiroto/nhsen a)/n,
tou\s a)lfitamoibou\s toi=s a)po/rois trei=s xoi/nikas
dei=pnon pare/xein a(/pasin h)\ kla/ein makra/,
i(/na tou=t' a)pe/lausan *nausiku/dous ta)gaqo/n.

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
meta\ tou=to toi/nun eu)preph\s neani/as
leuko/s tis a)neph/dhs' o(/moios *niki/a|
dhmhgorh/swn, ka)pexei/rhsen le/gein
w(s xrh\ paradou=nai tai=s gunaici\ th\n po/lin.
ei)=t' e)qoru/bhsan ka)ne/kragon w(s eu)= le/goi,
to\ skutotomiko\n plh=qos, oi( d' e)k tw=n a)grw=n
a)neborbo/rucan.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: nou=n ga\r ei)=xon nh\ *di/a.

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
a)ll' h)=san h(/ttous: o( de\ katei=xe th=| boh=|,
ta\s me\n gunai=kas po/ll' a)gaqa\ le/gwn, se\ de\
polla\ kaka/.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: kai\ ti/ ei)=pe;

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
prw=ton me/n s' e)/fh
ei)=nai panou=rgon.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: kai\ se/;

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
mh/ pw tou=t' e)/rh|.
ka)/peita kle/pthn.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: e)me\ mo/non;

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
kai\ nh\ *di/a
kai\ sukofa/nthn.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: e)me\ mo/non;

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
kai\ nh\ *di/a
twndi\ to\ plh=qos.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: ti/s de\ tou=t' a)/llws le/gei;

sp.speaker: *xoro\s
sp.p:
gunai=ka d' ei)=nai pra=gm' e)/fh noubustiko\n
kai\ xrhmatopoio/n: kou)/te ta)po/rrht' e)/fh
e)k *qesmofo/roin e(ka/stot' au)ta\s e)kfe/rein,
se\ de\ ka)me\ bouleu/onte tou=to dra=n a)ei/.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: kai\ nh\ to\n *(ermh=n tou=to/ g' ou)k e)yeu/sato.

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
e)/peita sumba/llein pro\s a)llh/las e)/fh
i(ma/tia xrusi/' a)rgu/rion e)kpw/mata
mo/nas mo/nais, ou) martu/rwn e)nanti/on,
kai\ tau=t' a)pofe/rein pa/nta kou)k a)posterei=n,
h(mw=n de\ tou\s pollou\s e)/faske tou=to dra=n.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: nh\ to\n *poseidw= martu/rwn g' e)nanti/on.

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs
sp.p:
ou) sukofantei=n, ou) diw/kein, ou)de\ to\n
dh=mon katalu/ein, a)lla\ polla\ ka)gaqa/,
e(/tera/ te plei=sta ta\s gunai=kas hu)lo/gei.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.p: ti/ dh=t' e)/docen;

sp.speaker: *xre/mhs

sp.p:

molubdoxoh/santes ku/klw| peri\ ta\ sfura\
a)/nw 'piqei=nai pro/fasin a)nti\ lhku/qou.

sp.speaker: *qerapai/na
sp.p:
w)= maka/rios me\n dh=mos, eu)dai/mwn d' e)gw/,

oi( gei/tone/s te pa/ntes oi(/ te dhmo/tai,

h(/tis memu/rismai th\n kefalh\n murw/masin,

tou/twn a(pa/ntwn ta\ *qa/si' a)mforei/dia.
e)n th=| kefalh=| ga\r e)mme/nei polu\n xro/non:
ta\ d' a)/ll' a)panqh/santa pa/nt' a)pe/pteto:
w(/st' e)sti\ polu\ be/ltista, polu\ dh=t' w)= qeoi/.
ke/rason a)/kraton, eu)franei= th\n nu/xq' o(/lhn
e)klegome/nas o(/ ti a)\n ma/list' o)smh\n e)/xh|.
a)ll' w)= gunai=kes fra/sate/ moi to\n despo/thn,
to\n a)/ndr', o(/pou 'sti/, th=s e)mh=s kekthme/nhs.
